5#include "include/cppgc/heap-consistency.h"
6
7#include "include/cppgc/heap.h"
8#include "src/base/logging.h"
9#include "src/heap/cppgc/heap-base.h"
10
11namespace cppgc {
12namespace subtle {
13
14// static
15bool DisallowGarbageCollectionScope::IsGarbageCollectionAllowed(
16 cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle) {
17 auto& heap_base = internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle);
18 return !heap_base.IsGCForbidden();
19}
20
21// static
22void DisallowGarbageCollectionScope::Enter(cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle) {
23 auto& heap_base = internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle);
24 heap_base.EnterDisallowGCScope();
25}
26
27// static
28void DisallowGarbageCollectionScope::Leave(cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle) {
29 auto& heap_base = internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle);
30 heap_base.LeaveDisallowGCScope();
31}
32
33DisallowGarbageCollectionScope::DisallowGarbageCollectionScope(
34 cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle)
35 : heap_handle_(heap_handle) {
36 Enter(heap_handle);
37}
38
39DisallowGarbageCollectionScope::~DisallowGarbageCollectionScope() {
40 Leave(heap_handle_);
41}
42
43// static
44void NoGarbageCollectionScope::Enter(cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle) {
45 auto& heap_base = internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle);
46 heap_base.EnterNoGCScope();
47}
48
49// static
50void NoGarbageCollectionScope::Leave(cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle) {
51 auto& heap_base = internal::HeapBase::From(heap_handle);
52 heap_base.LeaveNoGCScope();
53}
54
55NoGarbageCollectionScope::NoGarbageCollectionScope(
56 cppgc::HeapHandle& heap_handle)
57 : heap_handle_(heap_handle) {
58 Enter(heap_handle);
59}
60
61NoGarbageCollectionScope::~NoGarbageCollectionScope() { Leave(heap_handle_); }
62
63} // namespace subtle
64} // namespace cppgc
